reason.raw: This causes compiler warnings and didn't have a no-gpu job run before creating it. I will resubmit when it is clean
reason.html: This causes compiler warnings and didn't have a no-gpu job run before creating it. I will resubmit when it is clean

description.raw:
Merge forward a few pull requests that went into gazebo5. This should wait until 6.0.0 has been released.

* pull request #1808: Use ToSDF functions to simplify physics_friction test

* pull request #1809: Initialize sigact struct fields that valgrind said were being used uninitialized

* pull request #1813: Add missing ogre includes to ensure macros are properly defined

* 52c93cc: Include ogre_gazebo.h in SelectionBuffer.cc, which wasn't part of pull request #1813 since this file didn't use the `OGRE_VERSION` macros in gazebo5
description.html:
Merge forward a few pull requests that went into gazebo5. This should wait until 6.0.0 has been released.

  • pull request #1808: Use ToSDF functions to simplify physics_friction test

  • pull request #1809: Initialize sigact struct fields that valgrind said were being used uninitialized

  • pull request #1813: Add missing ogre includes to ensure macros are properly defined

  • 52c93cc: Include ogre_gazebo.h in SelectionBuffer.cc, which wasn't part of pull request #1813 since this file didn't use the OGRE_VERSION macros in gazebo5

title.raw: Merge gazebo5 to gazebo6 (wait until after 6.0.0)
